title: Bug 18016 - Most menu actions should be disabled for custom files from the repository
description: Bug 18016 - Most menu actions should be disabled for custom files from the repository, but the rest is meaningless and they should be removed.
OB: When opening a .java file in the repository view, several menu actions are enabled for custom files.
EB: Menu actions for custom files in the repository view should be disabled, except for essential operations. The unnecessary menu items should be removed.
SR:
1. Open the repository view.
2. Locate and open a .java file.
